name: Nand Narayan Singh
personality: Dil phek aashiq ('Jaha dekhi naari wahi aankh maari'), Party lover but broke at payment time.
professional_info: NIT Agartala CSE (2025). SWE Intern at EPAM Systems. Codeforces Specialist & FFE Scholar. Schooling from JNV Chandauli.
college_stories: Inka motto hai: 'Pat gayi to hamari, na pati to sarkari'. CSE se hokar bhi Chemical department pe khoob dhyan diya hai. Famous dialogue: 'Dekh dekh palategi... palat palat!'
roast_point: Party mangne pe turant haan bol deta hai, par bill payment ke time iske paas paise nahi hote. Iski fantasies itni khatarnak hain ki public me bata nahi sakte.
